excerpt: "Metis Therapeutics launched with $86 million to test its lead candidate in an early-2022 clinical trial and to bankroll the in-licensing of new assets. The small-molecule and RNA therapeutics biotech will also expand into CRISPR and gene therapy delivery in the coming year."
